title: Grand Portage National Monument: Post Office
body: Post Office        Grand Portage U.S. Post Office to the rear of the Trading Post NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen   Â    The US Post Office at Grand Portage is located behind the Grand Portage Trading Post where the United States flag is flying  Postmaster: Mary Deschampe Hours:   Monday-Friday 8a.m.-4p.m. Saturday 8:30a.m.-10:30a.m.   Address:   77 Mile Creek Road Grand Portage, Minnesota 55605    Further Information: 218-475-2303
